languages.text: "Ай-яй, ксеносы, ну что за дивные существа, шерин! Только что остроухая прислуживала губернатору, но ветер сменился — и вот она уже рассказывает слезливую историю о печальной судьбе своего народа и бедах этого мира... И во всем винит род людской, разумеется!" {n}Джай цыкает зубом и недоверчиво косится на эльдарку.{/n} "Но, стоит признать, есть в ее словах и разумное зерно".

"Ah, xenos... Such wonderful creatures, shereen! Just before we came, Pointy Ears spent her days serving the governor, but the moment the wind changed, she started regaling us with tragic tales about her people's dismal fate and the world's plights... and we humans are to blame for everything, naturally!" {n}Jae clicks her tongue and glances at Yrliet with suspicion.{/n} "Although there is a grain of sense to her words, I will give her that."
languages.original_text: "Ай-яй, ксеносы, ну что за дивные существа, шерин! Только что остроухая прислуживала губернатору, но ветер сменился — и вот она уже рассказывает слезливую историю о печальной судьбе своего народа и бедах этого мира... И во всем винит род людской, разумеется!" {n}Джай цыкает зубом и недоверчиво косится на эльдарку.{/n} "Но, стоит признать, есть в ее словах и разумное зерно".

Just before we came, Pointy Ears spent her days serving the governor, but the moment the wind changed, she started regaling us with tragic tales about her people's dismal fate and the world's plights... and we humans are to blame for everything, naturally!" {n}Jae clicks her tongue and glances at Yrliet with suspicion.{/n} "Although there is a grain of sense to her words, I will give her that."

languages.text: 「ああ、異種族か…実に素晴らしい生物だな、シャリーン！ちょうどあたしたちが来る前、トンガリ耳が知事に仕えていたが、風向きが変わった途端、彼女はあたしたちに彼女の種族の悲惨な運命や世界の苦境についての悲劇を語り始めた…そんでもちろん、すべての元凶はあたしたち人間のせいだとな！」{n}ジェイは舌を鳴らし、疑念の目でユリエットを見た。{/n}「だが、彼女の言葉には少しは意味があると認める」
languages.original_text: "Ah, xenos... Such wonderful creatures, shereen! Just before we came, Pointy Ears spent her days serving the governor, but the moment the wind changed, she started regaling us with tragic tales about her people's dismal fate and the world's plights... and we humans are to blame for everything, naturally!" {n}Jae clicks her tongue and glances at Yrliet with suspicion.{/n} "Although there is a grain of sense to her words, I will give her that."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、異種族か…実に素晴らしい生物だな、シャリーン！ちょうどあたしたちが来る前、トンガリ耳が知事に仕えていたが、風向きが変わった途端、彼女はあたしたちに彼女の種族の悲惨な運命や世界の苦境についての悲劇を語り始めた…そんでもちろん、すべての元凶はあたしたち人間のせいだとな！」{n}ジェイは舌を鳴らし、疑念の目でユリエットを見た。{/n}「だが、彼女の言葉には少しは意味があると認める」

languages.text: « Ah, les xénos... De magnifiques créatures, n'est-ce pas, shereen ? Juste avant notre arrivée, mademoiselle Oreilles Pointues passait ses journées au service de la gouverneure, mais dès qu'elle a senti que le vent tournait, elle a commencé à nous raconter le triste destin de son peuple et des misères que son monde a endurées... et tout est la faute des humains, comme toujours ! {n}Jae claque la langue et dévisage Yrliet d'un air suspicieux.{/n} Même si je dois avouer qu'il semble y avoir un fond de vérité dans ses histoires larmoyantes. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, xenos... Such wonderful creatures, shereen! Just before we came, Pointy Ears spent her days serving the governor, but the moment the wind changed, she started regaling us with tragic tales about her people's dismal fate and the world's plights... and we humans are to blame for everything, naturally!" {n}Jae clicks her tongue and glances at Yrliet with suspicion.{/n} "Although there is a grain of sense to her words, I will give her that."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, les xénos... De magnifiques créatures, n'est-ce pas, shereen ? Juste avant notre arrivée, mademoiselle Oreilles Pointues passait ses journées au service de la gouverneure, mais dès qu'elle a senti que le vent tournait, elle a commencé à nous raconter le triste destin de son peuple et des misères que son monde a endurées... et tout est la faute des humains, comme toujours ! {n}Jae claque la langue et dévisage Yrliet d'un air suspicieux.{/n} Même si je dois avouer qu'il semble y avoir un fond de vérité dans ses histoires larmoyantes. »

languages.text: “啊，是异形……多么奇妙的生物啊，亲爱的！就在我们来这里之前，那个尖耳朵还整天在总督身边忙前忙后。可风向变了的那一刻起，她突然就讲起了她的世界遭遇的变故，说她的族人过得多惨……而且不用想也知道，这一切都是我们人类的错！”{n}婕伊啧了啧舌，满脸狐疑地看了伊莉耶特一眼。{/n}“不过我得承认，她的话确实有一定道理。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, xenos... Such wonderful creatures, shereen! Just before we came, Pointy Ears spent her days serving the governor, but the moment the wind changed, she started regaling us with tragic tales about her people's dismal fate and the world's plights... and we humans are to blame for everything, naturally!" {n}Jae clicks her tongue and glances at Yrliet with suspicion.{/n} "Although there is a grain of sense to her words, I will give her that."

traits.locale_text: “啊，是异形……多么奇妙的生物啊，亲爱的！就在我们来这里之前，那个尖耳朵还整天在总督身边忙前忙后。可风向变了的那一刻起，她突然就讲起了她的世界遭遇的变故，说她的族人过得多惨……而且不用想也知道，这一切都是我们人类的错！”{n}婕伊啧了啧舌，满脸狐疑地看了伊莉耶特一眼。{/n}“不过我得承认，她的话确实有一定道理。”

languages.text: «Ah, xenos... ¡Unas criaturas maravillosas, shereen! Justo antes de que llegáramos, nuestra amiguita orejuda se ganaba la vida sirviendo a la gobernadora, pero, en cuanto vio que las tornas se volvían, no tardó en contarnos las tragedias de su pueblo y las penurias del mundo... ¡Y por supuesto la culpa la tenemos los humanos!». {n}Jae chasquea la lengua y le dedica una mirada de sospecha a Yrliet.{/n} «Aunque sus palabras no son huecas del todo. Eso se lo reconozco».
languages.original_text: "Ah, xenos... Such wonderful creatures, shereen! Just before we came, Pointy Ears spent her days serving the governor, but the moment the wind changed, she started regaling us with tragic tales about her people's dismal fate and the world's plights... and we humans are to blame for everything, naturally!" {n}Jae clicks her tongue and glances at Yrliet with suspicion.{/n} "Although there is a grain of sense to her words, I will give her that."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, xenos... ¡Unas criaturas maravillosas, shereen! Justo antes de que llegáramos, nuestra amiguita orejuda se ganaba la vida sirviendo a la gobernadora, pero, en cuanto vio que las tornas se volvían, no tardó en contarnos las tragedias de su pueblo y las penurias del mundo... ¡Y por supuesto la culpa la tenemos los humanos!». {n}Jae chasquea la lengua y le dedica una mirada de sospecha a Yrliet.{/n} «Aunque sus palabras no son huecas del todo. Eso se lo reconozco».

languages.text: "Ah, Xenos ... Solch wunderbare Kreaturen, Shereen! Vor unserer Ankunft hat Fräulein Spitzohr hier ihre Tage in Diensten der Gouverneurin zugebracht. Sobald sich der Wind aber zu drehen begann, hat sie begonnen, uns tragische Geschichten vom schrecklichen Schicksal ihres Volks und vom Leid dieser Welt aufzutischen ... und wir Menschen sind natürlich an allem schuld!" {n}Jae schnalzt mit der Zunge und blickt Yrliet misstrauisch an.{/n} "Wobei in ihren Worten schon ein Funken Vernunft liegt, das muss ich gestehen."
languages.original_text: "Ah, xenos... Such wonderful creatures, shereen! Just before we came, Pointy Ears spent her days serving the governor, but the moment the wind changed, she started regaling us with tragic tales about her people's dismal fate and the world's plights... and we humans are to blame for everything, naturally!" {n}Jae clicks her tongue and glances at Yrliet with suspicion.{/n} "Although there is a grain of sense to her words, I will give her that."

Sobald sich der Wind aber zu drehen begann, hat sie begonnen, uns tragische Geschichten vom schrecklichen Schicksal ihres Volks und vom Leid dieser Welt aufzutischen ... und wir Menschen sind natürlich an allem schuld!" {n}Jae schnalzt mit der Zunge und blickt Yrliet misstrauisch an.{/n} "Wobei in ihren Worten schon ein Funken Vernunft liegt, das muss ich gestehen."

languages.text: "Şu zenolar... Ne harikulade yaratıklar, değil mi şirinim? Biz gelmeden bu Sivri Kulak valiye yamanıyordu. Baktı şimdi işin seyri değişti; vah halkımın başına gelen, aman dünyamın hâli nicedir diye atıp tutuyor. Ha bir de bu senaryoda suçlu kim, tabii ki insanlar!" {n}Jae, dilini şaklatıp Yrliet'e şüpheyle bakıyor.{/n} "Gerçi gördüklerimiz... Dediklerini doğrular nitelikte ama yine de..."
languages.original_text: "Ah, xenos... Such wonderful creatures, shereen! Just before we came, Pointy Ears spent her days serving the governor, but the moment the wind changed, she started regaling us with tragic tales about her people's dismal fate and the world's plights... and we humans are to blame for everything, naturally!" {n}Jae clicks her tongue and glances at Yrliet with suspicion.{/n} "Although there is a grain of sense to her words, I will give her that."

Baktı şimdi işin seyri değişti; vah halkımın başına gelen, aman dünyamın hâli nicedir diye atıp tutuyor. Ha bir de bu senaryoda suçlu kim, tabii ki insanlar!" {n}Jae, dilini şaklatıyor ve Yrliet'e şüpheyle bakıyor.{/n} "Gerçi gördüklerimiz... Dediklerini doğrular nitelikte ama yine de..."
